articles.description: The trade window of IPL 2024 will remain open until November 26, 2023 - here's the updated list of all transfers and coaching announcements.
articles.content: Ahead of the IPL 2024 auction, the focus has shifted to finalising the list of retained players. The transfer window will remain open until November 26, 2023, after which no trading will be allowed –… [+2358 chars]
